text: Antonio Tarsia (1662–1739) was an Italian sculptor.European works of art in the M. H. de Young Memorial Museum 1966 "Antonio Tarsia was a prominent Venetian sculptor who produced many works for Venetian churches." He was born in Venice. Tarsia was mentor and father-in-law to sculptor Antonio Corradini.
